name: NyQuilandDayQuilFluReport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Nyquil™ & Dayquil™ flu flash briefing will provide you with your weekly report (with up-to-date data sourced from the CDC) so you can track flu cases throughout the season. As part of the flash briefing, you’ll be able to get access not just to the National briefing which covers the entire U.S., but also choose up to 10 regional feeds.

Regional Flu Report Feeds:
-- Central Southern Region Flu Report (AR/LA/NM/OK/TX)
-- Great Lakes Region Flu Report (IL/IN/MI/MN/OH/WI)
-- Mid Atlantic Region Flu Report (DE/MD/PA/WV/VA)
-- Mid West Region Flu Report (IA/MO/KS/NE)
-- New England Region Flu Report (CT/ME/MA/NH/RI/VT)
-- New York & New Jersey Region Flu Report (NY/NJ)
-- North West Region Flu Report (AK/WA/OR/ID)
-- Rocky Mountains Region Flu Report (CO/MT/SD/ND/UT/WY)
-- South Eastern Region Flu Reports (AL/FL/GA/KY/MS/NC/SC/TN)
-- South Western Region Flu Report (CA/AZ/NV/HI)
